text:
[Verse]
Walking down the street so wild
Neon lights and endless style
Pavement thumps beneath my feet
City rhythm can't be beat

[Verse 2]
Open skies and crowded lanes
Every corner screams my name
Passing faces in the night
Every moment feels so right

[Chorus]
Oh we're wandering wonders
Under city thunder
Lost in all the splendor
Hearts and minds so tender

[Verse 3]
Every building tells a tale
Silent stories we unveil
Graffiti whispers on the walls
Echoes of the urban calls

[Chorus]
Oh we're wandering wonders
Under city thunder
Lost in all the splendor
Hearts and minds so tender

[Bridge]
Every twist and every turn
Moments fleeting never spurn
In the night we find a way
To make memories that stay
title: Wandering Wonders
